channel.title: * My New Server Project Delta Based *
channel.description:
Hi this is my new project and I know this is delta but I'm sure this project will go far... Since I don't have much time I'l just post some pictures quick and re-edit this again later today
So far I have: Economy Based - About 80% Just need to lower drop rates. Grand Exchange - When Player Disconnects, Item goes back to Invent. GodWar Bosses Skilling Area Auto countdown donations Better combat system Great Donator items Donator Area Train Areas More Skill Areas New Barbarion assault New Godsword emotes When you kill a boss it sends a message to the player telling them the drop Webclient 100%! More to come later today.....
[size=14pt]Future Updates:[/size] Host the server More areas to train - advanced mining areas etc - will work out trust me :) Actual GodWars Maps. Depending on how successful it is - spread around all the skills. Add Dungeoneering - wont be perfect, just one of those npc kill - teleports. Need more suggestions, please leave comments
[IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh95/zezina/woodcutting.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh95/zezina/cooking.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh95/zezina/Moremining.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh95/zezina/traininghome.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh95/zezina/cclkan.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh95/zezina/equipments.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh95/zezina/equipment-2.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh95/zezina/Grandexchange.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh95/zezina/shops.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh95/zezina/backofhome.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh95/zezina/generalgraardor.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh95/zezina/teleportsmonster.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh95/zezina/Teleports.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh95/zezina/zil.png[/img]
Crappy highscores- mysql used to work with me but now it has some connection errors -.-
[IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh95/zezina/highscores.png[/img]
80 mining + needed. [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/1005029/advanced_mining.png[/img] Credits
Me Delta Swat Moparscape google Others

item.title: * My New Server Project Delta Based *
item.dc:creator: @kiriako13 kiriako13
item.description:
@kiriako13 wrote:

Hi this is my new project and I know this is delta but I’m sure this project will go far…
Since I don’t have much time I’l just post some pictures quick and re-edit this again later today

So far I have:
Economy Based - About 80% Just need to lower drop rates.
Grand Exchange - When Player Disconnects, Item goes back to Invent.
GodWar Bosses
Skilling Area
Auto countdown donations
Better combat system
Great Donator items
Donator Area
Train Areas
More Skill Areas
New Barbarion assault
New Godsword emotes
When you kill a boss it sends a message to the player telling them the drop
Webclient 100%!
More to come later today…

[size=14pt]Future Updates:[/size]
Host the server
More areas to train - advanced mining areas etc - will work out trust me
Actual GodWars Maps.
Depending on how successful it is - spread around all the skills.
Add Dungeoneering - wont be perfect, just one of those npc kill - teleports.
Need more suggestions, please leave comments
